############################################################################### namelist_flato13ipcc.xml
Description Reproducing selected figures from IPCC AR5, chap. 9 (Flato et al., 2013): Figs. 9.2a/b, 9.4a/b, 9.5, 9,7, 9.10, 9.24a, 9.29, 9.32, 9.45
Author Axel Lauer (DLR, Germany - axel.lauer@dlr.de) Veronika Eyring (DLR, Germany - veronika.eyring@dlr.de)
Contributors Irene Cionni, ENEA, namelist_eyring13jgr.xml (Fig. 9.10) Ricard Levine, UK Met Office, namelist_SAMonsoon.xml (Fig. 9.32) Mattia Righi, DLR, namelist_perfmetrics_CMIP5.xml (Fig. 9.7), namelist_aerosol.xml (Fig. 9.29) Daniel Senftleben, DLR, namelist_SeaIce.xml (Fig. 9.24) Sabrina Welzel, DLR, namelist_wenzel14jgr.xml (Fig. 9.45)
Projects EMBRACE ESA CCI CMUG ESMVal
Reference Flato, G. et al., Evaluation of climate models, in: Climate Change 2013: the Physical Science Basis, contribution of Working Group I to the Fifth Assessment Report of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change, edited by: Stocker, T. F., Qin, D., Plattner, G.-K., Tignor, M., Allen, S. K., Boschung, J., Nauels, A., Xia, Y., Bex, V., and Midgley, P. M., Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, UK and New York, NY, USA (2013)
This namelist is part of the ESMValTool ###############################################################################
